roleset.name: to modulate the voice
roleset.note: INFLECT-V NOTES: Nominal 'inflection' added by Julia based on BOLT-6. (from inflect.01-v)
INFLEXION-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from inflexion.01-n)
INFLECTION-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from inflection.01-n)

example.name: Throw Your Weight Around
example.text: Fortunately, gender-1 was inflected *-1 though the expression of it would be difficult for anyone not born in Siddo.
example.arg: though the expression of it would be difficult for anyone not born in Siddo

example.name: nominal rel: inflection
example.text: there is an overall feeling that his inflection on the word 'brah' just wasn't quite right.
example.arg: on the word 'brah' just wasn't quite right
